sentences.en: At present, so I am told, the high gods of medicine have decreed that the first cries of the young shall be uttered upon the anaesthetic air of a hospital, preferably a fashionable one .
sentences.cn: 现在，据我所知，医学界的大爷们已经颁布了法令，婴儿降生的第一声啼哭应当响彻在混合着麻醉剂的医院空气里，最好是一家时髦的医院。

sentences.en: Don't bother with a local anaesthetic, I can take it.
sentences.cn: 别为局部麻醉操心了, 我受得了.

sentences.en: Gemmell said: "An anaesthetic can slow the heart rate and we can give patients drugs to counteract that, which could be regarded as resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 基梅尔说，“麻醉会降低心率，我们可以给病人用药来抵消麻醉的作用，这也可以看作是一种复苏。”

sentences.en: He was given a general anaesthetic.
He's still groggy from the anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 他用过麻药,现在仍眩晕无力.

sentences.en: I had a local anaesthetic. I was conscious the whole time.
sentences.cn: 我只作了局部麻醉. 我一直是有知觉的.

sentences.en: In those days, dentistry was basic. Extractions were carried out without anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 那时候，牙科学刚起步，拔牙都不打麻药。

sentences.en: It requires at least a local anaesthetic and often a general one.
sentences.cn: 通常需要病人全身麻醉,至少也要局部麻醉.

sentences.en: It would have to be done under anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 这个只能在麻醉的情況下做.

sentences.en: Patients remain awake and the procedure is carried out using anaesthetic eyedrops.
sentences.cn: 即使在手术过程中使用麻醉眼滴,病人仍然保持清醒.

sentences.en: The anaesthetist gave the patient an anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 麻醉师给病人施麻醉剂.

sentences.en: The anesthetist gave the patient an anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 麻醉师给病人施麻醉剂。

sentences.en: The operation is carried out under a general anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 该手术是在全身麻醉情况下实施的。

sentences.en: The process normally involves the use of general anaesthetic, which is risky.
sentences.cn: 人工授精过程中通常包括全身麻醉, 这是有危险的.

sentences.en: Use as in pharmacy industry synthetic tranquillizer and anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 在制药工业中用作合成镇静剂和麻醉剂.

sentences.en: You'll be under ( an ) anaesthetic, so you won't feel a thing.
sentences.cn: 给你施 麻醉 后, 你就什麽也感觉不到了.

sentences.en: You'll be under anaesthetic, so you won't feel a thing.
sentences.cn: 给你施麻醉后, 你就什么也感觉不到了.

words.tran_cn: 麻醉；麻木；感觉缺失（等于anesthesia）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 局部麻醉；局部麻醉剂；局麻药

trans.tran_en: a drug that stops you feeling pain
